    • Method Detail

      • getSelector

        public ICSSSelector getSelector()
        Description copied from interface: ICSSCombinator
        Get the selector associated with the combinator. For example:
        s|VBox s|Label
        Then, s|Label as a combinator whose selector is s|VBox.
        Specified by:
        getSelector in interface ICSSCombinator
        Returns:
        The selector of the combinator.
